text: Honeymoon () is a 1956 Soviet comedy film directed by Nadezhda Kosheverova.К столетию Павла Кадочникова в Петербурге открыта мемориальная выставкаВ Петербурге открылась выставка к столетию Павла Кадочникова == Plot == Lyuda Odintsova, a graduate of the medical institute, called for engineer Aleksei Rybalchenko to stay in Leningrad after distribution. But unexpectedly, Aleksei agreed to work in Siberia, and poor Lyudochka had to follow her husband to a Siberian construction site and begin her working career as a doctor in a tiny medical center of a working village. == Cast == * Lyudmila Kasatkina as Lyuda OdintsovaБиография Людмилы Касаткиной * Pavel Kadochnikov as Aleksei RybalchenkoМедовый месяц. Дом Кино * Tatyana Pankova as Anna Terentyevna * Pavel Sukhanov as Ivan Terentevich * Zoya Fyodorova as Elizaveta Povariha * Sergey Filippov as ferryman * Ekaterina Savinova as Zoya * Anatoli Abramov * Valentin Abramov * Kirill Lavrov == Release == Nadezhda Kosheverova's film was watched by 26.5 million Soviet viewers, which is the 458 result in the entire history of the Soviet film distribution.СССР: Самые кассовые фильмы == References == == External links == * Category:1956 films Category:Russian- language films Category:Soviet romantic comedy films Category:Soviet films Category:1956 romantic comedy films Category:Lenfilm films Category:1956 comedy films
title: Honeymoon (1956 film)
